title: Episode 18: Afro-vegan stirrin' the pot
itunes:title: Afro-vegan stirrin' the pot
itunes:subtitle: Black veganism and Joloff rice
author: hangout@thestoop.org (Hana Baba and Leila Day)
itunes:author: Hana Baba and Leila Day
itunes:summary: We dig in to our food, our tradition. Does eating plant-based make you bougie? We talk to Afro- Vegan chef Bryant Terry who shows us what it means to be a dope Blegan (Black vegan). Then we get into the Jollof rice wars- who makes it better? Ghana, Nigeria? It's the world cup of Jollof!
